duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist with the planning, delivery, and review of all aspects of event planning, security risk assessment, manning, deployment, and management of the end-to-end events process at the client site.
Represent the Security team during the planning and executing of all office events.
Deliver professional meet & greet service to all visitors.
Support customer check-in at Front of house.
Assist with luggage check-in & storage and tagging system.
Assist with lost & found items process.
Report any incidents which may occur during events.
Carry out Campus tours & Gaming Demos.
Provide support and guidance on projects which have events outputs.
Work closely with the key teams to facilitate specific events, nationally and internationally.
Capture and present metrics where required.
Have a detailed understanding of the Client’s core values and culture and work toward this during all interactions.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED required
